'''''Amon Hen'' 170''' is the one-hundred-and-seventieth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in July [[2001]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Untitled''
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Bywater Announcements
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Announcements
* 2005 Conference Announcement
* [[Oxonmoot]] 2001
* Report: Fun at Mill ... Again
** By: [[Chris Crawshaw]]
* Critical Analysis of JRRT's Works
** By: Graeme Yates
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* Advertisement
** By: Dan Timmons
* Review: ''Four Christian Fantasists''
** By: Neil Mercer
* Artwork: Orc
** By: Tony Jackson
* Letters
* News From Fangorn
** By: Kim Mantas
* Member Profile - Angela Gardner
* Member Profile - Riaz Ali
* Mathom
** By: Mark Waller
* Artwork: ''Untitled'' (Hobbit Hole)
** By: Ian Collier
* Sally's Snippets
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* New Members/Committee
* Additional decorative artwork
** By: Susanne Stopfel
